Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. This product is not just an item, but a solution designed to enhance your daily life or work experience. Given its unique features and quality, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $150. Considering its market value and the benefits it offers, I'm extending you a special introductory offer at $200. I trust this price reflects the true value and potential impact of the product on your endeavors. Looking forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
